description:
The British racing driver Lewis Hamilton has won the Formula One World Championship for a third time. He secured the title with victory in the US Grand Prix in Texas. Hamilton thanked everyone who'd supported him.

"Well,I can't really... find the right words right the second to tell you how amazing this feels, and and just said I couldn't have done it without this team, who have powered me through the last three years, and really taken me on board and really helped nurture me with the car, and just faultless."

In the Rugby World Cup Australia have beaten Argentina to make it through to the final next Saturday will now take on New Zealand. The Wallabies won by 29 points to 15, our correspondent in Sydney is John Donaldson.

"This has been an amazing tournament for the southern hemisphere, all four semifinalists from the southern hemisphere, and an amazing final next week for this part of the world. Amazingly, these two teams who have both won the World Cup twice have never met in the final. But in terms of sporting rivalries at least, in this part of the world they don't get much bigger than the All Blacks against the Wallabies in Rugby Union."

title: 汉密尔顿第三次夺得世界冠军（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Every day when I wake it's just the same 每天醒来我还是我
Plot the ways that I could make my escape 计划着从黑暗中逃跑的路线
From the dark fall apart 四分五裂
To place so far where dreams are 去到梦所在的地方
Then I see your face and you show me the way 然后我看到了你的脸庞，你给了我方向
And the words you say set me free 你的言语让我自由翱翔
There's more to believe and so much more to see 眼见为实，耳听为虚
I am free, free to be me. 我自由了，我就是我自己。

讲解：

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
